goal.ch: 本課程旨在透過演示簡化/假設的企業個案，提升學生將公司財務理論應用於實務的能力。學生將學習如何以高度組織的方式摘要並報告個案，同時透過課堂上的討論以精進其財務直覺與分析能力。
goal.en: This course aims to improve students’ ability to apply corporate finance theories to practice by demonstrating simplified/hypothetical business cases. Students are expected to learn how to summarize and present cases in a highly organized way, and also develop better financial intuitions and analytical skills throughout the discussions in class.

outline.ch: 課程主題包括：財務報表分析，資金成本，資本預算，資本結構，國際財務管理，以及其他主題，例如支出政策，租賃決策和併購評估等。
outline.en: Main topics are: financial statement analysis, cost of capital, capital budgeting, capital structure, international financial management, and other topics such as the payout policy, decision for leases and evaluation of an acquisition, etc.

textbook.ch: Case Studies in Finance: Managing for Corporate Value Creation, by Robert F. Bruner, Kenneth M. Eades, and Michael J. Schill. 8th Ed, McGraw-Hill Irwin: 2018.（老師協助購置個案）
textbook.en: Case Studies in Finance: Managing for Corporate Value Creation, by Robert F. Bruner, Kenneth M. Eades, and Michael J. Schill. 8th Ed, McGraw-Hill Irwin: 2018. (The lecturer will provide access to selected cases)

gradMethod.ch: 出席狀況與課堂討論: 60％、作業: 40％、小組報告: 加分選項
gradMethod.en: 60％ for class participation, 40％ for group assignments, and possible extra marks if present cases orally
